model.name: build-component-0.3.0.0-pattern-adaptation
model.title: Build Component 0.3.0.0 Pattern Adaptation
model.description: Build component must be adapted to version 0.3.0.0 following established Web4 patterns: radical OOP, component-specific BuildModel extending Model, scenario-based configuration, IOR references, and proper dependency resolution for Web4 component build order management
